name: Day Trader - Stock Simulator
description:
Day Trader is the AD FREE companion to the hit indie investment game - INVEST Stock Market Simulator! They say you can't time the market but that doesn't mean you can't make millions...

• Trade in a simulated market that updates every few seconds
• Pump up stocks and dump them at the top for massive gains
• Publish short reports and close out your short positions with huge profits
• Hire analysts to formulate predictions
• Manage your portfolio and trade history
• Gain followers by performing profitable trades and unlock new perks
• Monitor news sources for events that impact sector profitability and stock prices
• Games take as little as 15 minutes or as long as you want
• Compete on global leaderboards for the best return
